website_summaries.verdict: This pan offers precise results. Works well for in the kitchen and outdoors.
pros: Strong reviews for its utility for many cuisine types
cons: The surface may scratch over time

customer_reviews.title: Disposable fry pan; great while it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: While it lasts, this is an absolutely phenomenal fry pan! The non-stick coating makes oil completely optional. The solid handle attachment feels sturdy. Cleanup is literally just a simple wipe. What's the catch? Well, the caveat is an easily melted red release slider which secures the handle. Once that's melted, the handle can't be removed intact. And you can't apparently purchase a replacement handle. Sadly, this crucial latch is in close proximity to high-heat. It lasted about 7-months for me. See photos attached, depicting the broken handle and latch deformation. It's a shame that the red latch plastic is not heat resistant as are all other parts of the removable handle. :'-(
customer_reviews.author: Mysteryna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camping frying pan
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice camping pan. Removable handles works great and appears to be very solid. We used this pan for 2 weeks during our camping trip without any complaints. The non-stick works well and very easy to clean, since the entire pan is smooth on the inside without rivets. It conducted heat very evenly since it has a very thick bottom. This is our new favorite camp frying pan.
customer_reviews.author: John DaSilva

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this pan is how sturdy it is and the weight to it. The clear lid as also a great plus and it can be used with other pans larger that it. I have used it on the our last two camping trips it saves me space as the removable handle and the handle is really sturdy. The heat distribution is really even. Initially I thought it was a bit pricey but after using it I really think it is good buy and looks like it will hold up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: On my induction cooktop, this pan has been a disappointment. To fry an egg, you have to preheat the pan a long time and then turn up the heat to level 8. There doesn’t seem to be good heat transfer on induction. Also, the eggs seem to slide toward the outside of the pan a bit. I was going to invest in a much more expensive pan, but after reading good reviews, I bought this. I’m thinking that any pan that’s not solid heavy metal on the bottom is not going to work well on induction. This has a thin layer applied to get it to work but it doesn’t work well, in my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Vienne Suzette

customer_reviews.title: gets scratched first day use. Very thin coating
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first and felt well made on my hand. However, coating came off at first use. It has very thin coating and scratches off so easily, which makes it useless. I am disappointed. No wonder local stores don't carry it, would have been lots of return.
customer_reviews.author: Sol bez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on the lid
customer_reviews.text: I meeannnn the pan is fine but the lid spontaneously combusted while I was cooking chicken, shattering glass all over my kitchen and subsequently ruined about $30 worth of food...so gonna have to go with 1 star. Amazon was great and refunded it completely but I’m just a little bit salty about the fact that instead of eating dinner right now, I’m cleaning shards of glass off my stovetop and counter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Frying Pan
customer_reviews.text: This Cleverona non-stick frying pan with removeable handle appears to be well made and very sturdy. I've used it several times, with my induction cooktop, using only nylon utensils, and it has performed fine. The removeable handle is well-sized, strong, and disconnects/connects very smoothly. The non-stick surface has performed well making stir-fry dinners and large lumberjack pancakes (the size a real man eats). It works fine with my induction cooktop and cleans easily after use. I'm very happy with my purchase of the Cleverona frying pan and I'm sure it will be used on many camping trips also.
customer_reviews.author: Merle Kruger

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I searched high and low for a frying pan with removable handle for camping. This is a nice heavy duty skillet and really good quality. It stows away easily in my camping gear with the handle removed. The handle attachment and removal is easy and very secure. I don't worry about it coming off while cooking. My only complaint is the surface scratches easy. I prefer a stainless surface instead of a non-stick surface, but that is a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne S. White

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: If I could leave zero stars for this product and the way the company handles their customer complaints I would. Product only lasted 3 months before the handle broke now getting the black stuff on the bottom of the pan and white spots on the inside that, no matter how much I wash it by hand, won't come off. Wrote to the company and was told I would have to purchase a new handle for 8.99 plus 4.49 shipping. So much for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best pan I've ever owned in 35 years
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pan I've ever owned in 35 years. I've had this pan for 10 months. We use it at least once a week. It still looks like brand new. Doesn't need much oil/butter as the non-stick finish is amazing. It's heavy duty and easy to clean. FYI, I never put my pans in the dishwasher, hand wash only to preserve the finish. Directions say it can be put in the dishwasher, but I'm cautious on that. Takes less than a minute to clean.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, now meh.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pan when I got it in August. The removable handle works perfectly. The nonstick coating really did make cooking w/o oil possible.. But after six months of ir al use, the center of the pan has many scratches. And, of course, things stick where there are scratches. So it becomes necessary to scrub the surface to clean it. Every cleaning now seems to remove a little more of the coating. I Iike this a lot in August. Now, six months later in February, not so much. The lid is great, though—usable on many pans and pots—and lets steam escape.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Justice

customer_reviews.title: Great product for camping
customer_reviews.text: We just got back from camping and I was so happy to have this pan. The detachable handle is great for storage and is sturdy and helps with the heat conduction. (A friend who was camping had an all metal pan and his hand was getting on from the handle after a while. My pan was great with a good grip and saying cool to the touch.). The pan was also easy to clean and the non stick held up to it's name with minimal scratching! This is a good buy and worked well for my family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Skillet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this skillet in Nov 2018 and waited until I used it for awhile before writing a review. So far have not found anything that I don't like about this skillet. Cooks evenly, easy to clean, love the detachable handle. Have not used it in the oven yet because I usually use my Lodge cast iron but will be using it next time I bake a casserole. I am now looking for a smaller pan that goes with this one. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy  Mead

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pan
customer_reviews.text: Love it. would recommend it to anyone looking for a non-stick pan. the removable handle makes it easy to store. I used it in the oven to bake pork chops. perfect. The lid is a plus. Also made fluffy scrambled eggs. no sticking. great product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Barnick

customer_reviews.title: Love My Cleverona Essential Nonstick 11 Inch Fry Pan
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything I was looking for to keep in my RV. Limited on space and the detachable handle is a game changer. Made an omelette without adding butter to my pan first. Cleans up easily and definitely recommend to others. Added plus is it comes with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Kuebler

customer_reviews.title: Best nonstick pan I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best pan I ever purchased and I've purchased $100 pans. I just ordered a 2nd and the 3qt size to replace a different brand. I use this pan almost daily and it still looks almost new. It's super easy to handwash or place in the dishwasher
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clever Cleverona Frypan
customer_reviews.text: I saw this frypan mentioned at a cooking website and checked it out. The price was great so I ordered. When it arrived it was in a tidy box with instructions printed on the back. The instructions are for attaching and detaching the handle. The handle attaches and detaches cleverly - hence the name, I'm assuming. I have since ordeed the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in every way
customer_reviews.text: We are on a year long trip, going from vacation house to vacation house. Most houses have lousy pans so got this. It's excellent. Good weight, solid feel. Handle securely attaches with no movement. Removable handle makes it's better for packing. Truly nonstick: eggs slide off.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: Love the lid
customer_reviews.text: The lid was what made this pan stand out in a sea of choices. I'd had a multi-pan lid before but it was a thin metal and it warped. This fits snugly and I like glass so I can see how the food's doing. The pan feels solid but is not overly heavy. The handle snapped on easily and I'm not one to keep taking it on and off so I can't say much about that convenience. Have not used it in the oven as I rarely bake but may play with it just to see if I can. All I wanted was a good stovetop pan and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Maere Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Cleans up well and we got a multi cover for it which would fit other frying pans. We use it on our RV motor home and the quick release handle gives us a better storage opportunity. Even heating and have used it on our LP grille outside.
customer_reviews.author: Poppi

customer_reviews.title: Detachable handle is great for shipping
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to some army troops that needed something to cook with. It was great because the detachable handle meant it would fit inside the USPS "ship anywhere" boxes that I use. I'm sure the soldiers will be thrilled with their new frying pan!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Jones

customer_reviews.title: Overall Performance is Great
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to not like about this frying pan. Excellent heart distribution, nothing sticks to it, easy clean up and the handle off and on with push of the button and slight up or down pressure. Removable handle great for cleaning and storage.
customer_reviews.author: AMB15

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these pans and I absolutely love them. I just purchased one for my daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these pans and I absolutely love them. I just purchased one for my daughters birthday. It never sticks, everything slides right off of it. I have been using mine for at least 4 months and they are still as good as new. Just wish you made a larger version and a lid for the smaller one. I use mine a least two times a day. Love, Love it!!! Don't buy that over advertised copper one, it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Marlys Burdett

customer_reviews.title: I really like being able to remove the handle and put this ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like being able to remove the handle and put this in the sink and put it in the cupboard, too. And I think it is a really good pan as well. We'll see how long it lasts. My non-stick pans tend to last about a year. I'm trying to be careful with this one, including not too high heat.
customer_reviews.author: M. Askew

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and easy to clean.  Handle easy to attach and detach.
customer_reviews.text: The attachment point on the pan can be a nuisance when packing it in a backpack (it protrudes enough that it might cause wear points on the pack if care is not taken to take that into consideration).
customer_reviews.author: David Bangerter

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT BUY this product! Please take a look at my photos and video!
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely does not deliver what it proposes. I bought this frying pan because it is non-stick and the same day it arrived I was cooking an egg and the egg stuck completely. I will return and I want the money back. I have videos and photos. This video was filmed yesterday (May 26th, 2020). it was the first time using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Silva

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with my pan and even bought another one to give as a present but now only a few weeks after I bought it the non stick coating is coming off and now I have this little dots on my pan And of course the return time ran out
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Got the pan to use on a induction hot plate when gas was turned off due to plumbing problem. Very pleased with the pan. Removable handle allows pan to go into toaster oven. Non stick surface works very well. Very happy with product and would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Bruce james

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It requires very little oil, and food slides right out. The pan feels and looks very durable. The detachable handle is great! I'm tired of skillets that claim to be non-stick but aren't. This one is the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Ray L. Paulson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, and I have never removed the handle!
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this because of the removable handle. In fact, I have never removed the handle. I bought it because of the reviews on the quality of the cooking portion. This pan rocks. We have two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. PinkertonTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Pan for Home and Camping
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent pan. It's sturdy and spreads the heat evenly. I bought it specifically for camping because the handle is detachable but I like the pan so much I use it at home.
customer_reviews.author: Moonstone

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: This pan is higher quality and sturdy, compared to other camping frying pans. Love the thicker base, as my 2 burner propane stove is very hard to adjust. Previous thin pan would have a burn ring where the flame hits the pan. This distributed the heat well and did not have hot spots. Like the removable handle and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted for 17 mos...it's now in the trash.
customer_reviews.text: It actually was impressive up until the coating started to flake off. We liked the removable handle. The 11" pan was not our 'go to' pan and subsequently did not get moderate or hvy use. Always used on low - med heat, used with silicone spatula, and no oil sprays. It was always stored using felt pad dividers. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan.
customer_reviews.text: Really useful pan.. The pan, lid and handle all work perfectly, I've cooked omelets, little sauces, and croutons in this pan. Right size for two.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: a secure detachable handle is a great convenience. the skillet is solid
customer_reviews.text: We have a boat. a secure detachable handle is a great convenience. the skillet is solid. I expect it to hold up well. So far, I'm very happy!
customer_reviews.author: carole

customer_reviews.title: Great until the handle cracked off
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pan and I ordered this thinking that I would like it as much as the first one. Unfortunately the plastic handle became griddle very quickly and broke. I would like to know if they can offer a replacement handle. I don’t want to be disappointed with this product that I used to like so much. Especially because it was so easy to store and take with us camping.
customer_reviews.author: KatTen

customer_reviews.title: non stick
customer_reviews.text: handle detaches well from pan when transferring into oven. Pan has a 1cm diameter slightly raised bump underneath the non-stick coating that should not have passed quality control.
customer_reviews.author: DFS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pan, doesn't need any fat and washes easily. The detachable handle is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Trailing Spouse

customer_reviews.title: A handle that’s not in the way
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a skillet that makes sense! The handle is not in the way! Hallelujah! You put it on & take it off as needed. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne

customer_reviews.title: Solid pan
customer_reviews.text: Used on the gas hob, in the electric oven (without handle), washed in the dishwasher. Pan hasn't warped at all, it is a good heavy pan (not heavy like cast iron) but you can feel its solid. The handle attaches and removes very easily. I would buy again. Quick delivery also.
customer_reviews.author: Ktk Wood

customer_reviews.title: Made to last
customer_reviews.text: I like the thick bottom. Really helps distribute the heat evenly. pan is also easy to clean. I have only just started using it so I can't tell how well it will last but it appears as though it has been made to last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these pans!
customer_reviews.text: Great weight to the pans as well as the snap on handles and the lids......omg! Exactly what I was looking for. I got all the pans offered and would get more if offered in more sizes...(hint hint). I'd like to have one in a dutch oven size. Well worth the investment for me.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand of nonstick pan I've ever owned. It can be used both on stove top and in oven. I bought the 10.25 inch and the 11 inch pans. Now I want the 3 qt saucepan too. When they come out with more sizes, I intend to purchase them. The most practical and clever feature is the detachable handle. The pans are of high quality, cook fast, and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Wai E.

customer_reviews.title: Removable handle is very handy, so far the non stick surface is holding up
customer_reviews.text: I usually wait on reviewing an item like this as one can never tell just how long the non stick coating will hold up. But the removable handle is just TOO handy so Im giving it 5 stars now and will alter my review if I run into any nasty surprises. 11Mar17
customer_reviews.author: Scott H.

customer_reviews.title: I used it right away. Eggs cooked quickly and ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it right away. Eggs cooked quickly and evenly. No stick is great- no butter or oil was needed.
customer_reviews.author: BW3s

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it to bake with yet but I've fried chicken and bacon in it alot. When I first cooked bacon in it I didn't use any kind of non-stick spray and it amazed me! I continually fry chicken & bacon in it flawlessly. I've hand washed it and threw it in the dishwasher multiple times and still don't need to use spray or vegetable oil.
customer_reviews.author: MadeofMetal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - scramble eggs are so much fluffier!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My husband is so happy with it! It definitely makes eggs fluffier than our stainless steel Wolfgang Puck pans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I really love this pan. Nothing sticks to it. I bought it to cook eggs but because it is so easy to clean I use it for everything. Highly recommend this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Judy N.

customer_reviews.title: HAVE USED A FEW TIMES AND SO FAR I LIKE IT VERY MUCH
customer_reviews.text: HAVE USED A FEW TIMES AND SO FAR I LIKE IT VERY MUCH..WITHOUT THE HANDLE ATTACHED, IT FITS NICELY IN MY STANDING RANGES BOTTOM STORAGE DRAW.
customer_reviews.author: marge

customer_reviews.title: Turns out this size is perfect. The product itself is handy.
customer_reviews.text: Because the 10-inch cover was accidentally broken, to get a new one, I was looking around other more expensive items, but decide to order the same brand, just bigger size. This is my second one. Both are great! This big one's cover can be used on the small one. The product itself is handy, neat, and very convenient, in addition to the good price!!
customer_reviews.author: previous buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a camping trip. I currently use as an everyday pan.
customer_reviews.author: FrenchE88

customer_reviews.title: Great fry pan
customer_reviews.text: The pan is surprisingly more heavy duty then I expected for the price. It cleaned up great the first time. I got the hang of the detachable handle quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tlm

customer_reviews.title: I have a very small area to store my pans in our motor home and this is a perfect fit. I was very pleased that it’s a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Cleverona Fry Pan pan because of its detachable handle. I have a very small area to store my pans in our motor home and this is a perfect fit. I was very pleased that it’s a heavy pan that won’t warp easily with the propane burners. I can’t find anything that I don’t like about it.
customer_reviews.author: KAT

customer_reviews.title: works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had a bigger size; from stove top to oven, works great!!!
customer_reviews.author: J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love this pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan, re-moveable handle and cover. The cover is made so that it doesn't drip down on the stove like so many others. The handle detaches for easy story and washing and the pan is a nice heavy duty one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Pan!
customer_reviews.text: Truly nonstick! Am really enjoying this pan, particularly on the days when I use little oil. And cleaning is a breeze. Timesaver! And the lid! Have used it on several pans.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding pan. Fits perfectly on my ceramic stove top. Very pleased and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cauterucio

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: We love to grill a lot and we can put this pan in the grill and remove the handle and do what ever we like in here! Pan is heavy and very sturdy! A+
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a great product. Solid, easy to clean, good heat distribution.
customer_reviews.author: RAM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient to store on my boat. Limited cabinet space
customer_reviews.author: william darrow

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product. Seems to have become more effective at ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product. Seems to have become more effective at non-stick the more I use it. Easily washed with removable handle, I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I wondered how I would like it. I love it. It is a bargain, and nothing ever sticks. The sides are high enough to hold stuff in, but low enough to be easy to scoop. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pan, I wish I bought a larger one
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan, I wish I bought a larger one. The lid and the pan are dishwasher safe and the cooking is even.
customer_reviews.author: Maria H Czarniak

customer_reviews.title: Great pan!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! This nonstick pan does it's job well and the removable handle is very secure. Having a smooth cooking surface and edge with no rivets makes for great cooking and easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Kristen Smith

customer_reviews.title: A novel pan that maintains its reputation as nonstick
customer_reviews.text: This pan is just what I wanted. It's showed no signs of having the infamous "food stick" that can occur just a few weeks after using it daily. The cover is sturdy and slips into place snugly. The pan feels solid; the handle is well built and snaps on and off with precision. I would buy their other pan(s) without any hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jeff W. Easlick

customer_reviews.title: Cooks evenly!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product, it cooks much more evenly than my other frying pans. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Detachable handle makes it easy to store. Nonstick surface makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J Mac

customer_reviews.title: Best skillet
customer_reviews.text: Best pan I've ever owned! Works perfectly and cleans up very easily. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleRobin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This pan is terrific. The inside surface makes eggs, with no additional butter or oil, slide right out on to your plate. The top fits perfectly. The seal is tight. The recommend th product wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done. Works well on my induction cooktop and ...
customer_reviews.text: Nicely done. Works well on my induction cooktop and fits inside a little toaster oven with the handle off. The handle and handle mechanism are well made and very solid.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Kulawik

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the pan is very good, but the handle it comes off very
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pan is very good ,but the handle it comes off very ,very easy. I had two accidents in the first day as I turn it over the handle came off.
customer_reviews.author: ella kogan

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: This is now my favorite pan Super high quality nonstick surface, thick aluminum heats evenly, removable handle is a bonus for easy dishwashing.
customer_reviews.author: TJDAY

customer_reviews.title: it is not electric..my mistake in the order,
customer_reviews.text: Good pan. Detachable handle is tricky. Not sure why it is removable. If the idea is for oven use, since it is not easily removable, the risk of a burn is possible as you try to detach it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty fry pan with exceptional nonstick quality. The removable handle is very solid when attached yet easy to remove. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised. whatever I have tried to ...
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. whatever I have tried to date has been stick=free.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald G. Tidball

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I agree with a previous poster that the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I agree with a previous poster that the handle does not seem flimsy when connected and I don't even notice. I did not need space, but liked the size and positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this nonstick frying pan. Love that the handle comes off for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Johns

customer_reviews.title: Best pan ever
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY happy with this frypan! It is perfect for my needs which were a non-stick that I can fit into a counter-top oven. With the handle off it fits just perfectly. Clean-up is extremely easy. Considering buying a 2nd one as back-up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, very satisfied purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Top of the line product! Durable and just the right heaviness to it, do you know it's high quality.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scataglia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to clean. Love that it goes in dishwasher. Love to have another one.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Very good pan, especially for camping, due to it's removable handle.
customer_reviews.text: Very good pan, especially for camping, due to it's removable handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this pan. I have actually bought 4 of them for us and family members! Great size, nonstick, love handle removal to wash, and see through lid with hole for steam.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding non stick surface and love the detachable handle. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lyberg

customer_reviews.title: Replacement handle is $21
customer_reviews.text: The removable handle is a nice idea, unfortunately it's fairly fragile - Mine lasted a year. Non-stick surface is so-so.
customer_reviews.author: ic3b3rg

customer_reviews.title: It's really good product. Nothing sticks
customer_reviews.text: It's really good product . Nothing sticks, I can fry eggs without any oil. The only thing is, the pan could be a little deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Ania

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The snap on/off feature is not only cool but completely functional and very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Cal Williford

customer_reviews.title: The non-stick did not last long. :(
customer_reviews.text: I loved this pan but it did not last long. It worked great for a while but the non- stick compound quickly wore off. I never used metal utensils or put in dishwasher. Food just started sticking and is now useless. I'm bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Stovetop To Oven In A Click
customer_reviews.text: Love the stovetop to hot oven capability. Handles are secure but easy to remove before popping skillet into the oven.

customer_reviews.title: SOLID
customer_reviews.text: Solid and well made. The detachable handle snaps on and off easily and also makes a solid connection to the pan. The non-stick works very well and cleans up is easily. I have only owned the pan for a few days so I can not attest to the durability of the non-stick surface but I am hoping that it will last.

product_meta.title: Cleverona Essential Nonstick 11 Inch Fry Pan with SecureSnap Detachable Handle and Large Clever Lid - Dark Grey
feature_bullets: ✔ PROFESSIONAL DESIGN & QUALITY – Our 11 in. (28 cm) non-stick frying pan features a flared rim for drip-free pouring and a thick 4.5-mm. bottom that resists warping and distributes heat evenly. Compatible with various heat sources (induction, radiant, ceramic, halogen & gas).

✔ REMOVABLE SECURESNAP HANDLE – Designed with a SecureSnap ergonomic handle that detaches easily and snaps on securely. Reduce the pan length quickly from 19.5" to 13.4" by pulling the release button and angling up the pan at 30 degrees. Place and store the pan in tight spaces effortlessly. Fits small sinks or dishwashers; fits in a bag for camping and BBQ's or any outdoor activity; fits small drawers, cupboards, or shelves for easy storage.

✔ LARGE UNIVERSAL LID – Includes a universal lid with silicone rim, which is highly heat-resistant and doesn't stick to the pot or pan; it does not melt or wear off when you use it while cooking. Steam Vent is just the right size and prevents suction or high pressure buildup, keeps soups, sauces, and stews from boiling over. It has an elevated, cool-touch knob that stays safe and cool to the touch, and will not get hot. No need for potholders or worry about getting burned.

✔ PREMIUM & SAFE NON-STICK SURFACE – Heavy duty 2-layer reinforced non stick, PFOA-free surface resists scratches and allows free-oil cooking. Oven safe up to 480 degrees (handle off). For a more pleasant cooking experience this Cleverona nonstick fry pan is designed to resist the harsh scratches of your spatula, so you don't have to worry about the coating peeling off and leeching into your food. Your bacon and eggs do not stick to the pan too, or even your favorite french toast.

✔ MULTI-PURPOSE PAN – This non-stick fry pan can also be used as a wok, sauce pan, casserole or even a baking pan. So you can stir-fry your favorite dishes, make dips and sauces and go directly from stove to oven to bake cakes, pastries or even bread!
